turns.content: Hello?
Hi Grandpa, it's me! Don't you recognize my voice? It's urgent we talk about something important.
Oh hello there, I'm sorry but your voice sounds familiarCould you tell me who I'm speaking with please? We should also check with Grandma before going ahead with anything important.

It's okay, Grandpa. My name is... your grandson or granddaughter! You know, the one who was visiting over Christmas last year. Can't remember my exact name right now but I need your help urgently. There's a situation with some tax issues and I'm worried about what might happen if we don't resolve this quickly.

Oh, hello there dear. It is so nice to hear from you! And yes, Christmas was wonderful. If it's about taxes, maybe it would be best to talk to Grandma first though, she knows all our financial stuff well. Can I put the call on hold and check with her?

Sure thing, Grandpa. But can we make this quick because time is running out here. The IRS just called me earlier today saying there's an unpaid tax bill for you guys and if it isn't resolved soon, they're going to arrest me and take away your safety deposit box where all the important papers are stored. They told me I need to pay four thousand eight hundred fifty dollars or else... well, you know what will happen. Can we just take care of this now? Please tell Grandma for me too, okay?
Oh my, that does sound serious. Let me check with your grandma right away then, and we'll figure out the best way to handle this together. Give me a moment while I go get her, alright?

Yeah, please hurry Grandpa. This is really important. They gave me just one hour before they come after us. We can't let that happen. Please find Grandma quickly and we'll sort everything out right away.
Alright, dear, I understand how urgent this seems. I'll go get your grandma immediately and we will take care of it as soon as possible. Can you hold on for just a moment?
Sure, but please don't take too long Grandpa. This is really pressing. Once you're ready, let's talk about what to do next so we can avoid any trouble with the IRS.
I'll be right back as soon as I find her. Don't worry, we'll sort this out quickly. Just give me a moment.
Okay, Grandpa, but please hurry. The clock is ticking and I'm worried they might catch up to us if we don't act fast. See you in a bit.
I understand your concern, dear. I'll do my best to return quickly with Grandma so we can address this right away. Hold on for just a moment longer, please.
Alright Grandpa, but make it quick, okay? This is serious and time is not on our side. See you soon.
I'm doing my best to find her quickly, dear. Just give me a minute more. We'll get through this together.
Please hurry, Grandpa. Every second counts. Let's solve this as fast as we can once you're back.
I will do my utmost to return swiftly, dear. One moment more and I'll be right with you both. Stay calm, we'll figure it out together.
Okay Grandpa, but please come back soon. This is really critical now. See you in a bit.
I'm making haste, dear. Just give me a few moments to locate your grandma and I'll be right with you. We will sort this out quickly together.
Alright Grandpa, but please hurry. Time is running out here. See you soon so we can take care of it.
I understand the urgency, dear. Let me find Grandma as fast as possible and I'll be right back to assist with your request. Please hold on just a tiny bit longer.
